short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides extended functionality not provided by the web browser for the Alair application, the DMS for the E&C BIS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables additional functions, extending standard web interface. Designed for Alair in Air Liquide E&C.
